summary: A simple program to backup and restore your Skyrim saves.
descriptionHtml:
With this program, you are able to backup your Skyrim's saves, and with the flexibility of choosing where you want the files to be placed. This also allows you to restore your saves.Â 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Why choose this?
This program allows you to backup, restore, and can keep a log of the files you backup along with the date and time. Unlike other backup programs, this program compresses your saves into one zip archive and names the file according to what you name it.

Whats going on behind the scenes?
This program checks the saves to see if these saves files are valid, then it copies the selected saves and automatically compresses these files.

What's different about this?
This program has the ability to [b]backup selected Skyrim saves and also restore selected Skyrim saves.[/b]
author: HuyNguyenAu

files.name: BackupMySkyrimSaves
files.changelogHtml:
Rebuilt program from scratch.
Added a theme system.
Added ability to backup/restore selected Skyrim saves.
Added a night and day mode.
Added option to overwrite saves.
